name: Gomaze
description:
Control a mining cyborg while exploring different environments, avoiding encounters with mechanical creatures while trying not to run out of energy.

The game contains three different styles of gameplay:

- Survival mode comes with biomes and dangerous enemies with unique movement styles.

- Classic mode contains fewer features but is more challenging!

- Puzzle mode contains 120 levels of pure challenge and mystery!

Buy upgrades and appearance changes from the store, they will help you progress in survival mode!

Complete missions to earn great rewards and trophies!

Have fun on your journey and follow us on social media!

@3_players_team
